modName: Enderal (Angel Quest) Bug Fix...  Dal'Galas Castle Left Tower
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][i][b]PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE READ THIS Before Downloading... Read instructions further down  OR   read this and the instructions below...

[/b][/i][/size][list]
[*][size=3][i][b]I went crazy throwing the satchel at that barrier at least ten minutes then looked at the quest name... got mad as heck, and thought wait Angel hmmm...  SureAI and the guys and gals that made this mod, want you to have to think...  Save your game... right before you go into the next building, cave or thru that tunnel, otherwise it will drive you crazy having to go back an hour or more to repeat the same steps over... stop, wait, think...  Let's face it, it is a damn good mod/game... and you got it for free...[/b][/i][/size]
[/list][size=3][i][b]
Instructions:[/b][/i]   go back into the game and stand at the doorway you need to go thru, now look up at the Angels, all the way to the [u]Right[/u] (sorry, behind Calia, if your standing at the barrier doorway) just above the last Angel's [u]Right[/u] shoulder, that's the hole the satchel and arrow go in... oh and Good Luck...

If Still not working...  read on (Okay, standing facing the barrier doorway, you want to go thru, turn around and go back just inside that hallway, this automatically gives you or arms you with the Telekinesis spell, then go over to the hole and drop the satchel.  Try to throw it through that hole up there.)  Once it is in, shoot a flaming arrow into the same hole, [Hint: do pull all the way back on the bow] once the flaming arrow falls into the hole, give it a few seconds, about ten)  (Bang the barrier is no more)  There is a bow on the floor, below the hole and she keeps giving you flaming arrows.[/size]
author: BuliwyfWolfgar
